subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After Kansas City’s Edinson Volquez revived allegations that Toronto’s hitters steal signs, the Royals pounded the knuckleballer R. A. Dickey and grabbed a 3-1 series lead.
snippet: After Kansas City’s Edinson Volquez revived allegations that Toronto’s hitters steal signs, the Royals pounded the knuckleballer R. A. Dickey and grabbed a 3-1 series lead.
